mapper.select: SELECT T1.ATH_CD /* 권한코드 */ , T2.ATH_CD_NM /* 권한명 */ , T2.ATH_CD_EXPL /* 권한코드설명 */ , T1.MDFY_RGHT_CCD /* 수정권한구분코드 1:조회 2:수정가능 데이터없을시 권한X 인듯 */ , T1.HND_DETL_DTM /* 처리시간 */ , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE 1=1 AND EMPNO = T1.HND_EMPNO) AS hndEmpno /* 처리자 */ , T1.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , T1.SQ /* 일련번호 */ FROM IBIMS007B T1 /* 메뉴별권한코드 */ LEFT JOIN IBIMS006B T2 /* 권한코드기본 */ ON T1.ATH_CD = T2.ATH_CD WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MENU_ID = #{menuId} ORDER BY T1.ATH_CD

SELECT COUNT(T1.MENU_ID) FROM IBIMS007B T1 LEFT JOIN IBIMS005B T2 ON T1.MENU_ID = T2.MENU_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MENU_ID = #{menuId} AND T2.APLY_YN = 'Y' AND T2.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.ATH_CD = ( SELECT ATH_CD FROM IBIMS003B WHERE 1=1 AND EMPNO = #{empno} )
mapper.update: MERGE INTO IBIMS007B T USING ( SELECT #{athCd} AS ATH_CD , #{sq} AS SQ , #{menuId} AS MENU_ID , #{mdfyRghtCcd} AS MDFY_RGHT_CCD , #{hndDetlDtm} AS HND_DETL_DTM , #{hndEmpno} AS HND_EMPNO , #{hndTmnlNo} AS HND_TMNL_NO , #{hndTrId} AS HND_TR_ID , #{guid} AS GUID FROM DUAL ) S ON ( T.ATH_CD = S.ATH_CD AND T.MENU_ID = S.MENU_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.MDFY_RGHT_CCD = S.MDFY_RGHT_CCD , T.HND_DETL_DTM = SYSDATE , T.HND_EMPNO = S.HND_EMPNO , T.HND_TMNL_NO = S.HND_TMNL_NO , T.HND_TR_ID = S.HND_TR_ID , T.GUID = S.GUID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( ATH_CD , SQ , MENU_ID , MDFY_RGHT_CCD , HND_DETL_DTM , HND_EMPNO , HND_TMNL_NO , HND_TR_ID , GUID ) VALUES ( S.ATH_CD , S.SQ , S.MENU_ID , S.MDFY_RGHT_CCD , SYSDATE , S.HND_EMPNO , S.HND_TMNL_NO , S.HND_TR_ID , S.GUID )
mapper.select: SELECT T1.ATH_CD /* 권한코드 */ , T1.SQ /* 일련번호 */ , T1.MENU_ID /* 메뉴ID */ , T1.MDFY_RGHT_CCD /* 수정권한구분코드 (1: 조회, 2: 수정가능) */ , T1.HND_DETL_DTM , T1.HND_EMPNO FROM IBIMS007B T1 /* 메뉴권한 */ LEFT JOIN IBIMS005B T2 /* 메뉴기본 */ ON T1.MENU_ID = T2.MENU_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T2.APLY_YN = 'Y' AND T2.SCRN_APLY_SHP_CD = 'S' AND T1.ATH_CD = #{athCd} ORDER BY T1.MENU_ID
SELECT * FROM IBIMS007B WHERE ATH_CD = #{athCd} /* 권한코드 */ AND MENU_ID = #{menuId} /* 메뉴ID */
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBIMS007B ( ATH_CD, SQ, MENU_ID, MDFY_RGHT_CCD, HND_DETL_DTM, HND_EMPNO ) VALUES ( #{athCd}, (SELECT NEXTVAL(IBIMS007B_SQ)), #{menuId}, #{mdfyRghtCcd}, DEFAULT, #{hndEmpno} )
